This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: OBL pulsating have seen one before knew exactly what it was.
divs: sighting detailssitting on back of boat getting ready for bed near trail creek looking at a nearly full moon when i saw a orange \ red pulsating ball of light moving from the sw towards ne on a path that was from my observation to cross directly in front of the moon. i watched as it moved in the direction of the moon and grabbed my cell phone and put it in video mode to record what i was seeing. i have the video however, i cannot see the pulsating ball of light with my pc. i guess if i had some kind of video editor i could enhance or slow the video but i do not have access to this type of equipment and not sure my iphone video could be enhanced. it was strange that it looked close and bright but when it moved in front of the moon and passed all the way through the moons path, it was like the light was much further away and was much smaller. it fluttered a few times appeared to have moved to a se direction then completely disappeared. i have seen something like this years ago and reported it along with about 15 witnesses. the field person from mufon told me it was a orange ball of light (obl) so when i noticed this in the sky i recognized it to be exactly what i had seen before. i watched it for about 30 seconds to be sure it was not a plane or helicopter but no noise or aircraft light pattern was seen or heard.
